content: Ok, I think since AI automation is the experiment, we should aggressively experiment with it in a way that won't permanently harm my reputation and that can be monitored and paused if needed. This has been billed as an experiment, so I have some leeway and I think it would be really interesting to follow up with new posts or updates on this post with what automation tools were used, why and results with maybe affiliate links. This is all about helping a broke unemployed guy, so I feel like we have some flexibility to move fast and break some shit. What do you think?
